titles.title: Executive Branch Waste and Fraud Recovery Act
A bill to require repayment of wasteful agency spending, and for other purposes.
Executive Branch Waste and Fraud Recovery Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Executive Branch Waste and Fraud Recovery Act
This bill establishes a process for requiring current or former political appointees to repay certain agency spending if the agency's Inspector General determines that the appointee directed the agency to spend federal funds in a manner that is unlawful or inconsistent with agency regulations or policies and procedures.
